General.Name: Jinzhou Port Co Ltd B
General.Description: Jinzhou Port Co., Ltd. operates the Jinzhou Port in Liaoning Province, China. The company's port has 27 berths, including a 300,000-ton oil berth, 100,000-ton bulk cargo berths, and 100,000-ton container specific berths. It provides oil products, chemicals, bulk cargo, general cargo loading and unloading, warehousing, transportation, service and bulk filling and packaging functions. The company handles oil products, grain, mineral powder, and containers. Jinzhou Port Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Jinzhou, China.

4.Name: Ms. Guiping  Li
4.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
